source

Class CollisionEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • source.CollisionEngine

  • public class CollisionEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps all the collision-detection methods in one neat package.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollisionEngine() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean bounds_collision(MapEntity o1, MapEntity o2)
      Returns whether or not the two entities have intersecting boundaries This is also used with pixel_collision to ensure there even can be one.
      static boolean pixel_collision(MapEntity o1, MapEntity o2)
      Returns whether or not the two entities have collided (pixel-perfect)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CollisionEngine

        public CollisionEngine()

    • Method Detail

      • bounds_collision

        public static boolean bounds_collision(MapEntity o1,
                       MapEntity o2)
        Returns whether or not the two entities have intersecting boundaries This is also used with pixel_collision to ensure there even can be one.
        Parameters:
        o1 - The first entity to compare.
        o2 - The second entity to check.
        Returns:
        True if they're intersecting, false otherwise.

      • pixel_collision

        public static boolean pixel_collision(MapEntity o1,
                      MapEntity o2)
        Returns whether or not the two entities have collided (pixel-perfect)
        Parameters:
        o1 - The first entity to compare.
        o2 - The second entity to compare.
        Returns:
        True if they're collided, false otherwise.
